welcome_message_body: Welcome to Burke, a charming and historic city known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport, where most domestic and international flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for domestic flights and is connected to the main terminal via an underground walkway.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is primarily used for international flights and is connected to the main terminal via an underground walkway.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is primarily used for domestic and international flights and is connected to the main terminal via an underground walkway.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a fee for full access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport serves private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport offers a variety of services for travelers including check-in counters, baggage claim, and airport information.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
